title: Permanent account suspension for inactivity?
body:
Hi,
I haven't played for almost year and a half to the game. Today, I tried to log in to the game and a "player banned" messaged appeared saying my account was permanently suspended. 

Is this for the inactivity? Can it be reactivated?

Thanks.

replies.body: Hey, I'm unable to offer context through a public venue due to account security.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we can offer more details and help you out!
